nodes.text: The Azure Sunset was a luxury sail barge owned by the Pantoran noble Kyja Cho. During the Galactic Civil War, Kyja Cho hosted an event aboard the Azure Sunset, summoning Hutt crime lords and Corporate Sector Authority executives to view a rare krayt dragon pearl Cho had in her art collection. Unbeknownst to Cho, an Inquisitor from the Galactic Empire infiltrated the sail barge and was posed as an executive of the CSA.
